QuestData.Title: Sandscar Breach
QuestData.Description: I heard some mutterings about sand and snakes.$b$bThe plea comes from a tiny village on the very fringes of Zuldazar- hardly more than a few farms. Dol-something I think it was called. Don't know what they be calling it now. Go see what the fuss is about.$b$bBladeguard Sonji was sent ahead some time ago. She should be able to get you up to speed on that... situation.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Bladeguard Sonji at Sandscar Breach.
